name: Home-Towne Suites Tuscaloosa

reviews.text: I spent two nights here while attending a conference at the University of Alabama. The hotel is very clean and the rooms are large enough to be comfortable for a longer stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful. And the location is convenient to both the university and some good barbecue as long as you have a car.
reviews.title: Nice property
The best
reviews.text: Two notes of caution: the front desk closes at 10 p.m. and doesn't open until 10 a.m. on weekends. You can call an on-duty manager but it could be a while before they show up.

description: Home-Towne Suites extended stay properties offer a variety of room types. Our Tuscaloosa location features Executive Suites and Luxury Whirlpool Suites. You'll find everything you need to feel at home in our spacious suites from fully equipped kitchens and free WiFi to complimentary access to a local fitness center.Conveniently located only minutes from University of Alabama's campus, we're within walking distance of a variety of shopping areas and restaurants. We're also near Tuscaloosa's industrial park and Mercedes-Benz US International.
